abstract: Ken Starr is urged to be a little less Atticus Finch and a little more Miss Universe.
lead_paragraph: Warming up the Senate on Monday, one of President Trump’s lawyers, Jay Sekulow, promised the defense team would move in a manner “expeditious but yet thorough.” But even some of the president’s most enthusiastic supporters seem to have concluded that Ken Starr, the former independent counsel turned presidential defense attorney, failed to live up the bill.
